description:
• This presentation includes learning opportunities about understanding what it means to be an entrepreneur and what attitudes and traits are required to be successful, including: strategic thinking; coping with stress; motivation and resilience, networking, and making decisions and setting goals.
  • “The American Dream” is being able to own your own business, calling all the shots, and being your own boss.
  • Terms: Entrepreneur is defined as a person who creates a business from a need or personal expertise.
  • This course will only take a few minutes.
  • Short learning videos and simple quizzes.
title: Life Skills for Entrepreneurs
